## Source: ossf-package-analysis (11daf46221ff00d16c0c8784b95eba32196bb8f5543e2d3115c2b1826215c612)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'kangpy' @ 1.0 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
